name: Simple Surf Game
description:
This is my submission for the 0-hour game jam - http://0hgame.eu/. This game was made in 0 hours.

This game is based on Source Engine surfing mechanics. Do not hold W while surfing or else you will fall off. Hold D and make lateral mouse movements to adjust where you're headed. Look up Source Engine surfing tutorials for more info if you're confused.

Once you reach the end, you can start NG+ and increase your score. The game gets harder each time you finish.

Unfortunately I ran out of time to fix the mouse unlock issue, to unlock your mouse keep the mouse still and press ESC twice
